backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Report describing two logo‑related frontend features and their associated components and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Mapping of frontend file paths to short descriptive summaries of each component and configuration file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color vars for light/dark themes plus global background and border settings.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry loading the React app with the updated title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing login roles, product state, header logo, ordering messages, and conditional admin panel.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin form for adding products with validation and success/error alerts.
frontend/src/components/LoginView.tsx: Login form validating credentials and assigning admin or customer roles.
frontend/src/components/ShopView.tsx: Displays product cards or an empty state and triggers order callbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing a backend actor based on Internet Identity auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity, login, logout, and login-status states.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Manages a product list with localStorage persistence and exposes the list plus an addProduct function.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/types/product.ts: Defines the Product interface with name and price fields.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending fonts, colors, radii, shadows, and keyframes, with plugins enabled for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, features, issues, and branding fix requirements for a single‑page product and login app.
